p: Psidium guineense essential oil displayed effective antibacterial activity against Mycobacterium tuberculosis (MIC 126.4 µg/mL) [ 84]. The same with P. myrtoides oils against Streptococcus strains, as S. mitis (MIC 100 µg/mL), S. sanguinis (MIC 100 µg/mL), S. sobrinus (MIC 250 µg/mL), S. salivarius (MIC 250 µg/mL), and S. mutans (MIC 62.5 µg/mL) [ 91].
